title: X-23 Space Barge
wikitext:
[[File:X-23SpaceBarge.jpg|500px|thumb|right]] '''X-23 Space Barge'''
'''Craft''': Incom X-23 StarWorker
'''Affiliation''': General
'''Era''': Rise of the Empire
'''Source''': Pirates & Privateers (pages 56-60), The Star Wars Sourcebook (pages 38-39)
'''Type''': Intra-system space barge
'''Scale''': Starfighter
'''Length''': 38 meters
'''Skill''': Space transports: X-23 barge
'''Crew''': 2, plus labor droid, '''skeleton''': 1/+10
'''Crew Skill''': Varies widely
'''Cargo Capacity''': 5,000 metric tons
'''Consumables''': 1 week
'''Cost''': 325,000 (new), 145,000 (used)
'''Nav Computer''': Yes
'''Space''': 2
'''Atmosphere''': 225; 650 kmh
'''Hull''': 3D
'''Sensors''': *Passive: 5/0D *Scan: 10/1D *Search: 15/2D '''Capsule''': The X-23 StarWorker was an intra-system space barge produced by the starship manufacturing corporation Incom, capable of carrying up to 5,000 metric tons of cargo in its 2,000 cubic meter bay. Bereft of weapons, shields, and hyperdrive, the 38-meter long StarWorker had consumables enough to last a week, and could be crewed by only two sentients with a fifth-degree labor droid. In 11 ABY, Wedge Antilles flew a StarWorker to the Yavin 4 Jedi Praxeum to offload supplies.
